Detailed Description

MessageRouter is a static class to collect the base functionality of APOXI message routing. Posting a message in general means to enqueue the message to those message queues of application containers or service threads which are ready to receive this message.

Member Typedef Documentation

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN MessageRouter::AddPostMsgHook (  PostMsgHookFn  fn  )  [static]
 

Adds a PostMsgHookFn function pointer to the MessageRouter. Every time MessageRouter::Post is invoked, the callback function is called.

Parameters:
fn Function pointer to be added to the hook.
Returns:
Status if the hook was successfully added.

Posts an asynchronous message to the system.

BOOLEAN MessageRouter::RemovePostMsgHook (  PostMsgHookFn  fn  )  [static]
 

Removes a PostMsgHookFn function pointer from the MessageRouter.

Parameters:
fn Function pointer to be removed from the hook.
Returns:
Status if the hook was successfully removed.
